resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: An external API providing real-time stock data lookup by code or name.
resource_dependency.autoSuggestEndpoint: A predictive text endpoint returning matching stock names/codes based on partial input.

function: Allow users to search for stocks using either stock codes or company names with real-time suggestions.
static_description: A centered search bar at the top of the page featuring a navy border and placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name'. A magnifying glass icon is placed inside the right edge of the input field.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the input field focuses it and prepares it for typing.
As the user types, auto-suggested results appear below the input in a dropdown menu with a white background and navy borders.
Selecting an item from the dropdown populates the input field and triggers a redirect or display update showing the selected stockâ€™s information.

resource_dependency.basicStockInfoSchema: Database schema with fields: stock_id (unique ID), company_name (string), ticker_symbol (string), current_price (float), last_updated (timestamp).

function: Display fundamental information about a selected stock including company name, ticker symbol, and current price.
static_description: Below the search bar, a card-style container displays the company name in bold navy font, followed by the ticker symbol in parentheses and the current price aligned to the right.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon selecting or entering a valid stock identifier, this section dynamically updates with retrieved data from the database.

resource_dependency.chartLibrary: Integration with a charting library like Chart.js or D3.js for rendering interactive graphs.
resource_dependency.marketTrendDataSchema: Database schema containing historical prices and timestamps per stock_id.

function: Visualize market trends through time-series charts or graphs for selected stocks.
static_description: A full-width chart area beneath the basic info section showing a line graph of the stock's performance over time. X-axis shows dates, Y-axis shows price range. Background remains white with navy axes labels.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over any point on the chart reveals a tooltip displaying the exact date and value.
Clicking on different intervals (e.g., 1D, 5D, 1M) reloads the chart with updated data ranges.

resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Database schema with tables: revenues (recollected quarterly/yearly), earnings (EPS values), ratios (P/E ratio, debt-to-equity, etc.) linked via stock_id.

function: Present essential financial metrics relevant to investment decisions.
static_description: A tabular view displayed under the chart, listing key financial indicators such as Revenue, Earnings Per Share (EPS), P/E Ratio, Debt-to-Equity, and Dividend Yield in rows with headers styled in navy.

interaction_and_states.description: If the table exceeds vertical space, scrolling allows viewing additional entries while keeping header fixed.

function: Permit selection among various output formats when exporting generated reports.
static_description: A horizontal row of buttons labeled 'PDF', 'DOCX', and 'TXT' positioned near the bottom of the customization panel, all styled with navy backgrounds and white text.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing a format button highlights it visually and sets the chosen format for report generation/export.

resource_dependency.reportSectionsSchema: Database table mapping user-selected sections to their inclusion status in the report template.

function: Let users choose which parts they want included in their custom-generated stock report.
static_description: A checklist grouped vertically with checkboxes next to each option ('Basic Info', 'Market Trends', etc.), styled with navy checkmarks against a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Ticking or unticking boxes toggles whether those sections will be part of the final report content.

resource_dependency.reportGenerationEngine: A backend engine capable of compiling selected components into a structured document.

function: Compile and produce a complete stock report tailored according to user inputs and selections.
static_description: A prominent 'Generate Report' button centered below the customization tools, colored solid navy with white text stating 'Create My Report'.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing the button initiates processing, disables further clicks temporarily, and starts the report assembly workflow.

resource_dependency.previewRenderer: Frontend module that renders compiled HTML version of the report before download.

function: Offer users a live preview of how their report will look prior to downloading or sharing.
static_description: A scrollable iframe or embedded viewer immediately after clicking 'Generate Report', displaying formatted report content in real-time within a bordered white panel.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can scroll through the rendered preview to inspect formatting and content accuracy.

resource_dependency.exportHandler: Client-side logic managing file downloads in supported formats.

function: Enable saving/exporting of finalized reports in commonly used digital formats.
static_description: Once previewed, two adjacent buttons labeled 'Download PDF' and 'Export as DOCX' become active beneath the preview window, both navy-themed.

interaction_and_states.description: Each button triggers a download event specific to its associated format without reloading the page.

function: Define consistent styling across UI elements using a white background and navy accents.
static_description: All containers, cards, forms, and panels maintain a white background. Interactive components such as buttons, borders, and headings use navy (#000080) for contrast and branding.

function: Ensure optimal usability and readability regardless of screen size or device orientation.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly between desktop and mobile views. Navigation bars collapse into hamburger menus on smaller screens, and font sizes scale accordingly.

interaction_and_states.description: Resizing browser windows or switching devices reflows content blocks responsively while preserving core functionality.

resource_dependency.errorMessagingSchema: Standardized messages stored as constants for invalid inputs or missing data scenarios.

function: Inform users clearly when errors occur due to incorrect stock identifiers or unavailable data sources.
static_description: An inline alert banner appears above the search bar if an invalid entry is submitted, styled red but outlined in navy, with concise messaging like 'Invalid stock symbol.'

interaction_and_states.description: Displays appropriate error message directly below the input field until corrected or dismissed.

function: Provide feedback during system-intensive operations such as report compilation or data fetching.
static_description: A centrally-aligned animated spinner replaces the main action button or overlays the preview pane during long-running tasks, maintaining visibility against the white backdrop.

interaction_and_states.description: Loading indicator becomes visible once report generation begins and hides upon completion.

resource_dependency.sessionStorageSchema: Browser-based storage mechanism tracking recent searches, report preferences, and past exports tied to individual sessions.

function: Retain user settings and historical activity throughout browsing sessions.
static_description: No visible UI element; however, behind-the-scenes, preferences such as previously selected report formats and recently viewed stocks persist even after refreshes.

interaction_and_states.description: Previous selections remain accessible via local/session storage mechanisms unless explicitly cleared by the user.
